name: PiCross
description:
CLASSIC PUZZLE GAME IN A MODERN (AND COLORFUL) DESIGN.
Colors, numbers and logic: these things are very fun in πCross, a game based in Nonogram, a Japanese puzzle. The game have 88 exclusive levels for challenge you to discover beautiful and interesting pictures using only numbers and colors. πCross is available for Windows, Linux and Web and is textless (anyone can play, regardless of language!).

The source is also available in GitHub.

Credits
Programming: Gustavo Ceccon, Arthur Souza, Bruno Yoshikawa
Level Design: Arthur Souza, Anayã Ferreira, Gabriel Arantes, Gustavo Monteiro, Rafael Gallo, Rafael Clerici
Game Testing: Arthur Souza, Rafael Gallo, Ítalo Tobler, Juliana Crivelli, Leonardo Pereira
